name: Break Coffee Please
description:
Invite everyone to take a break! Otherwise.....

You work in an office and your task is to give everyone a rest!

Walk up to the vending machine and to get your coffee! Take coffee. When the office worker (plankton) gets angry, give him coffee and so on until the end of time. In game three ends!

Control by WASD, in the menu buttons W, S and ENTER. To: take, choose, give, press ENTER.

Good luck!

Text by Google translate.
